text: Treatment of renal cell cancer usually includes:         -  Surgery, which may be:                -  nephrectomy with removal of lymph nodes; or      -  partial nephrectomy with removal of lymph nodes.             -  Biologic therapy (interferon and interleukin-2) for cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.
